message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper proposes a new method for text recognition using attention mechanisms, which is a popular topic in computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP). The paper specifically focuses on the alignment problem in attention methods, which is a common issue in CV. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). However, since the paper also involves text decoding and prediction, it could also belong to cs.CL (Computation and Language) or cs.IR (Information Retrieval). The paper also mentions the flexibility and robustness of the proposed method, which suggests that it could be related to machine learning (cs.LG) or artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
